scripts.build:cjs: rimraf ../../dist/packages/repoman/cjs && npx tsc src/index.ts --outDir ../../dist/packages/repoman/cjs --lib es2022 --moduleResolution node --downlevelIteration --esModuleInterop --target ES2022 --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --moduleResolution node --sourceMap --module commonjs --declaration --declarationMap
scripts.build:esm: rimraf ../../dist/packages/repoman/esm && npx tsc src/index.ts --outDir ../../dist/packages/repoman/esm --module es2022 --lib es2022 --moduleResolution node --downlevelIteration --esModuleInterop --target ES2022 --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --moduleResolution node --sourceMap
